verse.name: v1
verse.lines: More about Jesus would I know, More of His grace to others show; More of His saving fullness see, More of His love who died for me.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: More, more about Jesus, More, more about Jesus; More of His saving fullness see, More of His love who died for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: More about Jesus, let me learn, More of His holy will discern; Spirit of God, my teacher be, Showing the things of Christ to me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: More about Jesus; in His Word, Holding communion with my Lord; Hearing His voice in every line, Making each faithful saying mine.

verse.name: v4
